column5: Leaving in a few hours .. see you all next week ... here's a couple pics from years gone by to keep you smiling
Have a good one looking forward to the report.  Nemo
Nice trout camillj but which ZEC are you going to??  Leechman
HAVE A GOOD 1 BRO!!! BEEN A LONG TIME LETS HOOK UP FOR A DRIFT IN THE FALL
You are indeed going to a special place. It must be hard to leave.
Good luck CJ. I'm looking forward to the report already.
Sounds Good Scott ... and geeze it'll be here before ya know it   We got quite a cold front this morning up in the laurentians .. I had three layers of clothing on ...

OK lads ... gotta go sleep now ... but I can say we got 30 fish amonst 13 of us ... no giants (1lb 5oz was the biggun for the weekend) ... but a great trip to GOD's country and some of the prettiest / tastiest fish on this planet .... pictures tomorrow
Zec des Nymph ... and dont ask which lake (I'd have to shoot you if I told you)
Looking forward to the pics and story Jon.
I hear you camillj!!  and I wont ask  The ZEC that I go to is St-Patrice and just love it.  It's 3.5 hour drive from my place and is just paradise up there  Leechman
